title: Bookjacket, Bookjacket for "Force and Freedom" by Jacob Burckhardt, 1955
title_raw: Bookjacket for "Force and Freedom" by Jacob Burckhardt
medium: Lithography in black, blue, orange and white ink on white shiny wove paper
inscribed:
Imprinted on the cover vertically in white ink at lower right in script: lustig
On the top half of the cover in orange, blue and white ink: Force and [orange F, the rest is white]/ Freedom [blue F, the rest is white]/ An Interpretation of history by/ Jacob Burckhardt
Across the bottom in orange and white: MERIDIAN BOOKS [orange] published by The Noonday Press M2 $1.35 [white]
creditline: Gift of Tamar Cohen and Dave Slatoff
description: The front cover is black and the back cover is blue. The author, title and publisher are written vertically down the spine. On the back cover are the title, author's name and reviews of the book. Produced for Meridian Press

tombstone.epitaph:
Bookjacket, Bookjacket for "Force and Freedom" by Jacob Burckhardt, 1955. Lithography in black, blue, orange and white ink on white shiny wove paper. 
Gift of Tamar Cohen and Dave Slatoff. 1993-31-174
